MainClaim.text: "The widespread availability of generative AI poses a threat to human creativity

Section1.text: "AI may make human creativity obsolete in various aspects of our lives."

Section2.text: "An underappreciated benefit of our creativity is the role it plays in connecting us to one another."

Section3.text: "Employing generative AI in place of our creative pursuits affects our prospects for social connection."

CreativeObsolescence.text: "The normative question of creative obsolescence is: If we come to rely on AI models instead of our own creativity

NormativeQuestion.text: "The value of human creativity cannot be secured by reliance on AI."

DescriptiveQuestion.text: "The descriptive question of creative obsolescence is: Will AI become the case that people abandon human creativity in favor of using AI to get what they want?"

Section1Argument.text: "Human creativity is valuable because it yields products of aesthetic

Section2Argument.text: "Creativity is valuable because it plays a role in enabling human connection."

Section3Argument.text: "Relying on AI rather than human creativity in the arts and sciences can lead to diminished social connection."

Anecdote.text: "Anecdote about the author's experience with Dall-E 2

LazyReliance.text: "The temptation to outsource creative work to AI is strong and growing stronger."

EmersonPremise.text: "Emerson's idea that thoughtless conformity to social norms can lead to alienation and loneliness."

AlphaFoldPremise.text: "AlphaFold's success in protein folding has led to a tendency to conceive of scientific progress as solely predictive power

Premise1.text: "Scientific creativity is valuable because it enables the sharing of ideas among scientists."

Premise2.text: "Creative theorizing is necessary for scientific understanding."

Premise3.text: "AlphaFold's black-box nature prevents it from furnishing scientific explanations."

Premise4.text: "Human creativity is necessary for scientific understanding."

Premise5.text: "Scientists cannot connect with AlphaFold in the same way they can connect with human scientists."

Premise6.text: "Scientific progress involves advances in both predictive power and understanding."

Premise7.text: "The tendency to conceive of scientific progress as solely predictive power is a threat to scientific creativity."

Premise8.text: "Human creativity is essential for scientific understanding."

Premise9.text: "The scientific community should be wary of adopting a conception of scientific progress that leaves out the importance of advancing shared human understanding."

Premise10.text: "The value of human creativity is not solely aesthetic

Premise12.text: "The self-disclosure that occurs when we are creative makes it possible for others to understand us."
